method.description: Currently this only returns the pid of the process locking the table (lockpid), if the lock is permanent (lockperm), and the status (lockstatus) -- 'not in use', 'open', 'read', 'write', or 'unknown'. However, the hope is that this will eventually return a complete description of the table.
